comments:
I'm using the 20040717 beta candidate driver of RAD. Not sure if this belongs in
Java Core, sorry if it doesn't.

I had two editors open, both VE, and went to open a 3rd 
when I noticed that the 3rd editor didn't have a palette.
I went back to my other editors and they had lost their palettes
as well.

The first two editors were heavy users of SWT.  I don't currently have a 
set of steps to reproduce this, but will hopefully be able to get one before
long.  In the meantime, hopefully the following trace will help to ping down
what's going on. If I can come up with reproducible steps, I will up the severity.

Wrapped exception
